attributes.review:
This app is terrible. 
When I first opened the app, tons and tons of ads to buy maga â€œmerchâ€ started to pop up. Now, I am a struggling highschool student in need of a job because I was just kicked out of my parents house for supporting our amazing president. I only have less than 100 dollars to my name, so when I opened the app I just expected news on the president and rallyâ€™s that he is holding. But was I in for a surprise. Every time I went to click something, an ad to buy his merch would pop up. I was very good at avoiding them but one time I wasnâ€™t so lucky. It made me buy OVER 100 DOLLARS OF MAGA MERCH. Now like I stated earlier, I do not have that type of money. So it charged my card (even though I had given it no information on my bank) and now I am in crippling debt. I was expecting to write a positive review and prove all of those â€œTikTokersâ€ wrong, but now I cannot do such thing. My heart has been broke too many times, I donâ€™t know what to believe anymore. So, from downloading this app It has caused me to go into a depression. No job will let me apply, or except my application. I would like a refund, for my pride and my money.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see why people like Trump so much, but as soon as I opened the app it asked for my phone number. So, like one does, I entered my number. As soon as I did that I started getting messages from unknown numbers telling me to â€œvote for trump or elseğŸŠâ€ As you can imagine, this was very unsettling, so I turned on the tv to get my mind off of it, but every channel was playing shows about why oranges are so great. This was odd, but then a package came to my door. When I opened the package 25 oranges spilled out of the box. I didnâ€™t know why I kept seeing oranges, to be honest thought it had nothing to do with the app until everything on the app turned orange. I wasnâ€™t long after that that my house started turning orange. I went to feed my puppies and oranges came out of the dog food bag instead of actual dog food. Later that day the bag itself turned into an orange. Now my dogs have no food, and I canâ€™t go to the store because my car turned into an orange as well. My puppies are hungry and itâ€™s all because of this app. Do NOT download this app unless you support dogs being hungry and sad.
